caption: Unidentified American artist, Polly Maxon of Stephentown, New York, ca. 1815. Oil on canvas; 85 × 82.5 cm (sight), 102.5 × 97.2 × 4 cm (frame). Gift of Edward Duff Balken, Class of 1897 (y1958-64)
